Name: Retro Snake Adventures
About the game: It's a unique twist on the Classic Snake Game. Kinda like Snake, but Adventure mode. Collect keys to get through doors, without crashing into walls or the trail your tail leaves behind. Make it to the end and get new keys to unlock new doors and clean up missed points on previous levels. It has Local Save, High Score, Stats, and Steam Achievements.
